changeSet.createView: SELECT CASE WHEN failed = true THEN 'FAILED' ELSE 'SUCCEEDED' END AS status, substring(executionlog.project, '(?<=<project (label=".+" )?name=")[^"]+'::text) AS project_name, arguments, start_time, run_time, error, log_id FROM public.ExecutionLog WHERE arguments LIKE 'execute%' ORDER BY start_time;
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE public.ProjectExecutions OWNER TO wres;
changeSet.comment: The public.ProjectExecutions view has been added to the database.
